artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: 2 volume book; beige cloth cover; vibrant woodblock images of various landscapes and streetscapes along the Tokaido
markings:
First 2 pages:Album of Fifty-three Stations of To_kaido_ Road(To_kaido_ goju_san-eki tsuzuki-ga); Hiroshige ga(seal on upper right); Takenouchi Magohachi(seal on lower left); URCL red collector seal: [AM]

Last 2 pages:Catalog of Hiroshige Prints(Ichiryu_sai Hiroshige ga mokuroku)-advertising of Hiroshige\'s prints series published by Ho_eido_
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
title: The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō, vol. 1
